_header: What is he this lordling that cometh from the fight
Title(s): ‘Quis est iste qui venit de Edom’
_description: William Herebert, ‘Quis est iste qui venit de Edom’ — twenty-three lines in monorhyming stanzas of 2, 3 or 4 lines each with a Latin tag in the margin

BLAdd46919.First Lines: What is he this lordling that cometh from the fight…
BLAdd46919.Last Lines: …On Godes mylsfolnesse ich wole byþenche meAnd heryen hym in alle þyng þat he ȝeldeth me
BLAdd46919.Attributed Author: Herebert (written by original hand to right of first line, f. 210)
BLAdd46919.Attributed Title: Quis est iste qui uenit de edom ysa 63 (centered above text, f. 210)
